Key Match Events: Jorge Soler homered to center (431 feet) in the 1st inning
Castro singled to center, Jeffers scored, Miranda to second in the 6th inning
Olson doubled to center, Ozuna scored in the 7th inning
Laureano singled to right, Olson scored, Laureano to second in the 7th inning
Williams doubled to left, Murphy scored and Arcia scored in the 7th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chris Sale won his major league-leading 15th game with six crisp innings
The resurgent Atlanta Braves beat the struggling Minnesota Twins 5-1 for a 3-game sweep
Others: The game was played at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota, with an attendance of 19,142 and a game time of 2:39
